rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast spells, you may exile two cards from your graveyard. Those spells cost {B}{G}{U} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay. [i](For example, a spell with mana cost {2}{U}{B} would cost {2}.)[/i]
Whenever another creature you control enters, you draw a card, then discard a card.
